description: Do you love the warm weather but find yourself longing for something cool? This refreshing brunch cocktail is perfect in tone and flavor. It'll take your mind off the summer heat with its tangy taste of grapefruit mixed into honey and rosemary.

name: Grapefruit, Honey, and Rosemary Smash
recipeIngredient: 2 pcs. Pink grapefruit, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.name: Place grapefruit juice, grapefruit wedges, honey, and rosemary in a large pitcher. Muddle until the sugar is dissolved.
recipeInstructions.text: Place grapefruit juice, grapefruit wedges, honey, and rosemary in a large pitcher. Muddle until the sugar is dissolved.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour mixture through a fine strainer to remove any solids. Add vodka (or bourbon) and lime juice to grapefruit syrup. Stir well and serve over crushed ice.
